update.description:
Apologies for the huge pull request. Changing the root of an inheritance tree causes changes to all children.

In this pull request:

1. Opaque data pointers in Sensor and children of Sensor. Take a look at `SensorPrivate.hh`. There ~~are two classes~~ is one class: ~~`SensorProtected` and~~ `SensorPrivate`. The ~~Protected version captures attributes that were `protected:` in `Sensor.hh`, and the~~ Private version captures attributes that were `private:` in `Sensor.hh`. (edited by @scpeters )

2. Removed the prefix `Get` from function names.

I'm working on the migration guide and change log.

[Jenkins no-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/910/) which had failing test that was fixed.
update.title: Pimpl Sensor heirarchy

content.html: Nate and I think this is related to the use of std::regex, which isn't supported on gcc 4.8. I'll work on redacting the use of std::regex

content.raw: I'm not suggesting we change this pull request, but couldn't the "removing `Get` from function names" part of this pull request have been separated? I think it would be easier to review separately. Maybe something to consider for future pull requests?
content.html: I'm not suggesting we change this pull request, but couldn't the "removing Get from function names" part of this pull request have been separated? I think it would be easier to review separately. Maybe something to consider for future pull requests?

content.html: I'm building this branch now and will investigate the test failures

update.description:
Apologies for the huge pull request. Changing the root of an inheritance tree causes changes to all children.

In this pull request:

1. Opaque data pointers in Sensor and children of Sensor. Take a look at `SensorPrivate.hh`. There are two classes: `SensorProtected` and `SensorPrivate`. The Protected version captures attributes that were `protected:` in `Sensor.hh`, and the Private version captures attributes that were `private:` in `Sensor.h``.

2. Removed the prefix `Get` from function names.

I'm working on the migration guide and change log.

[Jenkins no-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/910/) which had failing test that was fixed.
update.title: Pimpl Sensor heirarchy

content.raw: Ran a new [no-gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-trusty-amd64-no-gpu/967/testReport/) build: there are a few test failures
content.html: Ran a new no-gpu build: there are a few test failures

content.raw:
this particular new API name could be confusing, e.g. when looking at an example usage of this function:

`sensor->Visualize();`

At first glance, it appears to be telling the sensor to visualize its data as opposed to checking if sensor is being visualized. Maybe `IsVisualizationOn` or `IsVisualizationEnabled`?
content.html:
this particular new API name could be confusing, e.g. when looking at an example usage of this function:

sensor->Visualize();

At first glance, it appears to be telling the sensor to visualize its data as opposed to checking if sensor is being visualized. Maybe IsVisualizationOn or IsVisualizationEnabled?

content.html: remove this include? Pose3d is not used in this class
